amendment.description: To amend chapter 118 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit foreign war crimes prosecutions of Americans.

action.text: Amendment SA 320 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S3259-3260; text: CR S3260) To amend chapter 118 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit foreign war crimes prosecutions of Americans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 320 proposed by Senator Ensign.
